price: ហើយម្លប់ដើមឈើរបស់វានៅជិតពួកគេ ហើយផ្លែឈើ របស់វា ត្រូវគេធ្វើឱ្យងាយស្រួលបេះបំផុត។
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
